page.title: 08TRAFFIC CENSUS.
page.content: We did a traffic census on Forest Street to find out which was the most common kind of transport.We were there for one hour.We found out that the most common kind of transport was cars. We found out that the most common kind of car was the Ford Cortina or Sierra.The second most popular kind of transport was vans. The kind of transport which we saw were cars,vans,lorries,buses and motorcycles.The most common kind of motorcycle was Honda and Kawasakai 100cc. The order in which they came from the most common to the least common were cars,vans,lorries,buses and motorcycles. SHAUN LEWIS MARK BOWMER.
